record.dc:title: 22BY11 Rymer, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burials 15BY28 and 15BY29. Burial 28, a mature female. Burial 29, a juvenile, probably of male sex. Square 16R5.
record.wpa:narrative: [15BY28] Adult female in good condition, extended on back with head to NW. [15BY29] Juvenile female in fair condition, extended on back with head to SW. The skull of 15BY29 almost touches the left shoulder of 15BY28, pits converge--The evidence is not conclusive that 15BY29 precedes 15BY28, but it is probable owing to the greater depth of 15BY29 and the merging of the two pits.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration available on file. See also photograph 17BY11.
